name: TotalSupplyConstantAfterInit
description: Total supply must remain constant after contract construction (except for address(0) burns).

name: BalanceSumInvariant
description: Sum of all balances (excluding address(0)) must be equal to _totalSupply.

name: NonNegativeBalances
description: No account should have a negative balance.

name: ValidTransferEffect
description: On a successful transfer, sender's balance decreases and recipient's increases by the same amount.
invariant: balances[msg.sender] == balances_before[msg.sender] - tokens && balances[to] == balances_before[to] + tokens

name: ValidTransferFromEffect
description: On a successful transferFrom, balances and allowance are updated accordingly.
invariant: balances[from] == balances_before[from] - tokens && balances[to] == balances_before[to] + tokens && allowed[from][msg.sender] == allowed_before[from][msg.sender] - tokens

name: ApproveSetsAllowance
description: Calling approve sets the allowance exactly to the approved value.

name: OwnershipTransferCorrectness
description: Ownership is transferred only after acceptOwnership is called by newOwner.

name: NoETHFallback
description: Contract should reject ETH sent to fallback function.

name: InitialBalanceAssignedToOwner
description: Upon deployment, the full token supply is assigned to the owner.
